name: Master Round
effect: Grants a heart container.

name: Prime Primer
effect: Ingredient for the Bullet That Can Kill The Past.

name: Arcane Gunpowder
effect: Ingredient for the Bullet That Can Kill The Past, cannot be used.

name: Planar Lead
effect: Ingredient for the Bullet That Can Kill The Past.

name: Obsidian Shell Casing
effect: Ingredient for the Bullet That Can Kill The Past.

name: Meatbun
effect: Single use. Heals the player for one heart. Grants double damage until the player takes damage.

name: Medkit
effect: Single use. Heals the player for 4 hearts.

name: Ration
effect: Single use. Heals the player for two hearts. Automatically used if the player runs out of health.

name: Orange
effect: Single use. Fully heals the player, grants a heart container, and increases coolness by 2.

name: Friendship Cookie
effect: Single use. Resurrects your co-op partner with full health.

name: Bottle
effect: Holds hearts or ammo for use later.

name: Bomb
effect: Throws a bomb that explodes after a short delay.

name: Ice Bomb
effect: Throws a bomb that freezes enemies.

name: Chaff Grenade
effect: Stuns enemies. Can be used to steal items from shops.

name: Proximity Mine
effect: Places a mine that explodes when an enemy comes near it.

name: Cluster Mine
effect: Places 5 small mines that explode when an enemy comes into contact with them.

name: C4
effect: Places explosives on the ground which then can be detonated by using the item again.

name: Molotov
effect: Throws a Molotov that sets an area on fire.

name: Air Strike
effect: Calls down a bombardment on a large rectangular area.

name: Napalm Strike
effect: Sets a large rectangular area on fire.

name: Big Boy
effect: Calls down a missile at the crosshair, causing a large explosion that leaves behind a large pool of poison creep. Increases curse while held.

name: Roll Bomb
effect: Dodge rolling leaves behind a bomb.

name: iBomb Companion App
effect: Detonates all explosives and explosive enemies in the room.

name: Supply Drop
effect: Single use. Spawns ammo.

name: Ammo Synthesizer
effect: Adds a chance to regain ammo upon killing an enemy.

name: Armor Synthesizer
effect: Adds a chance to get armor upon completing a room.

name: Heart Synthesizer
effect: Adds a chance to get hearts upon completing a room.

name: Master of Unlocking
effect: Adds a chance to get keys upon completing rooms.

name: Utility Belt
effect: Grants an extra active item slot and increases maximum ammo by 20%.

name: Hidden Compartment
effect: Grants an extra active item slot and increased maximum ammo by 10%.

name: Backpack
effect: Allows the player to hold an extra active item.

name: Scope
effect: Increases accuracy.

name: Laser Sight
effect: Increases accuracy and adds a red laser sight to the player's weapons.

name: Ammo Belt
effect: Increases maximum ammo by 20%.

name: Bullet Time
effect: Slows down time while active.

name: Aged Bell
effect: Briefly stops enemies and enemy bullets. Can be used to steal from shops.

name: Singularity
effect: Spawns a black hole that attracts enemies and bullets.

name: Decoy
effect: Places a decoy that enemies will target. The decoy will be destroyed after taking enough damage. Can be used to steal from shops.

name: Explosive Decoy
effect: Places a decoy that enemies will target. The decoy will explode after taking enough damage. Can be used to steal from shops.

name: Melted Rock
effect: Causes enemy corpses to explode on use.

name: Trusty Lockpicks
effect: Has a 50% chance to unlock a lock or locked chest. If it fails, the lock will no longer function.

name: Smoke Bomb
effect: Temporarily become invisible to enemies. Can be used to steal from the Shop.

name: Box
effect: If the player enters a room while under the box, enemies will not target the player. Firing a weapon will remove the box. Has no effect if used while enemies are already targeting the player. Can be used to steal items from shops.

name: Fortune's Favor
effect: While active, bullets will curve around the player.

name: Jar of Bees
effect: Spawns bees that home in on and damage enemies.

name: Potion of Lead Skin
effect: While active, the player reflects enemy bullets.

name: Double Vision
effect: While active, doubles the player's bullets.

name: Relodestone
effect: Halves reload times. While active, the player absorbs enemy bullets and regains ammo.

name: Poison Vial
effect: Creates a pool of poison creep.

name: Potion of Gun Friendship
effect: While active, increases damage, fire rate, knockback, and reload speed.

name: Portable Turret
effect: Places a stationary turret that shoots at enemies. The turret will be destroyed if it takes enough damage.

name: Knife Shield
effect: Creates a ring of knives around the player that damage enemies and block enemy bullets. Knives vanish after taking enough damage. If used again while the shield is active, the knives are launched forward. Increases curse while being carried.

name: Grappling Hook
effect: Allows players to hook onto and then pull themselves towards walls at a fast speed. Hitting enemies with the hook will deal minor damage and stun them for a short duration. Allows players to steal items from the shop. The hook has an unlimited range.

name: Stuffed Star
effect: While active, the player is invincible.

name: Boomerang
effect: Throws a boomerang that travels around the room and stuns enemies.

name: Shield of the Maiden
effect: Pulls up a shield to protect players from bullets. Players are immobile while using the shield.

name: +1 Bullets
effect: Increases damage by 25%.

name: Rocket-Powered Bullets
effect: Increases the player's bullet speed by 50%, increases damage by 10%, and increases rate of fire by 10%.

name: Heavy Bullets
effect: Increases damage by 25% and doubles knockback but halves bullet speed.

name: Shock Rounds
effect: Creates a beam of electricity between fired bullets.

name: Bouncy Bullets
effect: Grants bullets the ability to bounce off objects.

name: Explosive Rounds
effect: Adds a chance to fire bullets that explode upon hitting an enemy or object.

name: Ghost Bullets
effect: Bullets pass through enemies and obstacles.

name: Alpha Bullets
effect: The first shot of a weapon's magazine will deal 80% more damage.

name: Omega Bullets
effect: The final shot of each magazine deals double damage.

name: Scattershot
effect: Guns fire a spread of tripled bullets which deal less damage.

name: Irradiated Lead
effect: Adds a chance to fire bullets that poison enemies.

name: Hot Lead
effect: Adds a chance to fire bullets that ignite enemies.

name: Frost Bullets
effect: Adds a chance to fire bullets that freeze enemies.

name: Charming Rounds
effect: Adds a chance to fire bullets that charm enemies.

name: Magic Bullets
effect: Grants all of the player's bullets a small chance to transmogrify enemies into chickens.

name: Fat Bullets
effect: Doubles bullet size and knockback, increases damage by 30%, and decreases maximum ammo by 10%.

name: Angry Bullets
effect: Hitting an enemy refires the projectile at a nearby enemy.

name: Battery Bullets
effect: Causes water that bullets pass over to become electrified, damaging enemies. Increases accuracy.

name: Homing Bullets
effect: Bullets have a chance to home in on enemies.

name: Shadow Bullets
effect: Firing a weapon has a chance to fire an additional projectile.

name: Easy Reload Bullets
effect: Dodge rolling reloads one bullet.

name: Stout Bullets
effect: Increases damage by 60% at close range, but decreases damage by 20% at further ranges.

name: Remote Bullets
effect: Fired bullets curve towards the player's crosshair. Increases damage by 10%.

name: Zombie Bullets
effect: Adds a chance to refund ammo when a shot misses.

name: Flak Bullets
effect: Whenever a bullet hits an enemy or wall, it splits into several smaller, lower-damage bullets.

name: Silver Bullets
effect: Increases damage against jammed enemies and bosses.

name: Gilded Bullets
effect: Increases damage based on the amount of money the player has.

name: Chaos Bullets
effect: Adds random bullet effects to the player's bullets.

name: Cursed Bullets
effect: Increases damage depending on how much curse the player has. Increases curse by 1.

name: Chance Bullets
effect: Upon firing, adds a chance to fire projectiles from the player's other guns.

name: Helix Bullets
effect: Doubles fired bullets and makes them move in a helix pattern, but slightly decreases damage.

name: Bloody 9mm
effect: Adds a chance to fire a fast, homing bullet that flies around the room damaging enemies.

name: Bionic Leg
effect: Increases movement speed and grants a piece of armor.

name: Shotgun Coffee
effect: Increases movement speed.

name: Shotga Cola
effect: Increases movement speed.

name: Ballistic Boots
effect: Increases movement speed.

name: Magic Sweet
effect: Grants a heart container, increases damage by 15%, increases movement speed, and increases coolness by 1.

name: Disarming Personality
effect: Decreases shop prices by 15%.

name: Mustache
effect: Has a 50% chance to heal the player upon purchasing an item.

name: Lichy Trigger Finger
effect: Increases rate of fire by 25%.

name: Enraging Photo
effect: Taking damage makes the player briefly deal double damage and instantly reloads their weapon.

name: Ballot
effect: Increases the player's coolness by 3, which decreases the cooldown of active items and increases luck.

name: Live Ammo
effect: Provides immunity to contact damage, and dodge rolls deal increased damage to enemies.

name: Eyepatch
effect: Increases damage by 20% but decreases accuracy.

name: Military Training
effect: Increases weapon accuracy and reload speed.

name: Cartographer's Ring
effect: New floors have a chance to be mapped out.

name: Ring of Fire Resistance
effect: Grants immunity to fire.

name: Ring of Miserly Protection
effect: Grants two heart containers. Disappears upon spending money.

name: Unity
effect: Increases damage based on the other guns the player has.

name: Ring of Chest Vampirism
effect: Breaking chests heals the player.

name: Cloranthy Ring
effect: Greatly shortens the time at the end of a dodge roll where the player is vulnerable.

name: Ring of Chest Friendship
effect: Increases the chance of finding chests.

name: Ring of Mimic Friendship
effect: Chests will not turn into Mimics.

name: Ring of Triggers
effect: Using an active item fires the currently held weapon in all directions.

name: Ring of Ethereal Form
effect: While active, the player is invincible and has flight. Allows user to steal items from shops.

name: Gundromeda Strain
effect: Decreases health of all enemies encountered by 25%.

name: Broccoli
effect: Increases damage by 10%, adds a 10% chance to negate damage, and increases movement speed.

name: Crutch
effect: Causes bullets to slightly curve towards enemies.

name: Spice
effect: Single use. Increases certain stats upon use, depending on how many times it has been used. Each time a spice cube is used, more spice cubes will spawn in place of items or pickups.

name: Liquid Valkyrie
effect: Decreases enemy bullet speed by 20%.

name: Bloody Eye
effect: Decreases enemy bullet speed by 15%.

name: Gunknight Helmet
effect: Grants a piece of armor upon pickup and another piece of armor every floor.

name: Gunknight Greaves
effect: Grants a piece of armor upon pickup and another piece of armor every floor.

name: Gunknight Armor
effect: Grants a piece of armor upon pickup and another piece of armor every floor.

name: Gunknight Gauntlet
effect: Grants a piece of armor upon pickup and another piece of armor every floor.

name: Amulet of the Pit Lord
effect: Falling into pits no longer deals damage.

name: Old Knight's Shield
effect: Grants two pieces of armor.

name: Old Knight's Helm
effect: Grants two pieces of armor.

name: Old Knight's Flask
effect: Heals the player for one heart upon use. Gains 2 charges each floor.

name: Old Crest
effect: Grants a piece of armor. Consumed upon taking any damage.

name: Armor of Thorns
effect:
Increases damage dealt by dodge rolling into enemies.
Grants armor upon pickup.

name: Full Metal Jacket
effect: Automatically activates one of the player's blanks when they are about to take damage.

name: Heavy Boots
effect: Prevents the player from being affected by enemy knockback, gun recoil, and conveyor belts.

name: Bug Boots
effect: Dodge rolling leaves a trail of poison creep. Makes the player immune to poison.

name: Gunboots
effect: Dodge rolling fires a spread of five bullets backwards. Slightly increases movement speed.

name: Springheel Boots
effect: Allows the player to roll again mid-roll.

name: Coin Crown
effect: Increases the chance to find  coins upon completing rooms.

name: Oiled Cylinder
effect: Halves reload time.

name: Ice Cube
effect: Reduces the cooldown timer of active items. Increases coolness by 3.

name: Rolling Eye
effect: Rolling through bullets reflects them at enemies.

name: Cigarettes
effect: Damages the player for half a heart and increases their coolness by 1 per use. Coolness decreases the cooldown of active items and increases luck.

name: Charm Horn
effect: Charms enemies around the player upon use. Can be used to steal from shops.

name: Cog of Battle
effect: When reloading, pressing reload again when the indicator passes a certain mark on the reload bar will instantly reload the weapon, decreasing the reload time and increasing the damage and accuracy of the next magazine.

name: Metronome
effect: Grants a damage bonus for each enemy killed. The bonus is reset if the player takes damage or changes guns.

name: Honeycomb
effect: Taking damage spawns bees that seek out and damage enemies.

name: Map
effect: Reveals the entire map for the current floor.

name: Gungeon Blueprint
effect: Reveals all floor-maps for the rest of the run.

name: Sense of Direction
effect: Points in the direction of the floor's exit.

name: Duct Tape
effect: Single use. Combines 2 guns by granting one gun the projectiles that the other gun fires.

name: Gungeon Pepper
effect: Deals damage to nearby enemies.

name: Antibody
effect: Adds a chance to heal the player for an extra half a heart whenever they receive healing.

name: Pink Guon Stone
effect: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Grants one extra heart container.

name: White Guon Stone
effect: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Grants an extra blank per floor.

name: Orange Guon Stone
effect: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Shoots at enemies.

name: Clear Guon Stone
effect: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Negates poison damage.

name: Green Guon Stone
effect: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Chance to heal upon taking damage.

name: Red Guon Stone
effect: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Improves dodging.

name: Blue Guon Stone
effect: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Upon taking damage, briefly slows time.

name: Glass Guon Stone
effect: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Destroyed upon taking damage.

name: Iron Coin
effect: 3 uses. Kills all enemies in a random room on the floor. Grants a 20% discount at shops while held.

name: Super Hot Watch
effect: Slows down time immensely while standing still. Moving speeds up time back to normal.

name: Drum Clip
effect: Increases the magazine size of all weapons by 50%.

name: Blood Brooch
effect: Increases Curse while held. Heals the player after dealing a certain amount of damage to enemies.

name: Backup Gun
effect: With each shot fired, a second bullet will be fired in the opposite direction that the player is aiming.

name: Sunglasses
effect: Slows down time and increases dodge power during explosions. Increases coolness by 2.

name: Mimic Tooth Necklace
effect: Every chest is guaranteed to be a Mimic.

name: Escape Rope
effect: Teleport out of the current room into the shop of the current floor.

name: Jetpack
effect: Can be toggled. While active, the player has increased movement speed and flight, but cannot dodge roll. Passing over puddles of oil will set them on fire.

name: Wax Wings
effect: Grants flight.

name: Blast Helmet
effect: Decreases the radius that explosions will hurt the player in.

name: Lament Configurum
effect: Upon use, spawns several enemies and has a chance to spawn a gun or item. Increases curse by 1.

name: Monster Blood
effect: Taking damage spawns a pool of poison creep. Grants immunity to poison creep and a heart container.

name: Nanomachines
effect: Grants two pieces of armor upon pickup. Grants a piece of armor every 4 times damage is taken.

name: Seven-Leaf Clover
effect: Increases the quality of chests.

name: Number 2
effect: Boosts stats when alone. Only available in co-op, where The Cultist starts with this item.

name: Gold Ammolet
effect: Increases blank damage. Grants an extra blank per floor.

name: Chaos Ammolet
effect: Blanks have a chance to poison, freeze, and ignite enemies. Grants an extra blank per floor.

name: Lodestone Ammolet
effect: Increases the knockback of blanks. Grants an extra blank per floor.

name: Uranium Ammolet
effect: Blanks have a chance to poison enemies. Grants an extra blank per floor.

name: Copper Ammolet
effect: Blanks have a chance to ignite enemies. Grants an extra blank per floor.

name: Frost Ammolet
effect: Blanks have a chance to freeze enemies. Grants an extra blank per floor.

name: Table Tech Sight
effect: Flipping a table briefly slows down time and triple the player's shots.

name: Table Tech Money
effect: Flipping a table flips all other tables in the room, and flipping a table has a chance to spawn money.

name: Table Tech Rocket
effect: Flipping a table causes it to launch forward and explode.

name: Table Tech Rage
effect: Flipping a table briefly doubles the player's damage.

name: Table Tech Blanks
effect: Flipping a table activates a free blank.

name: Table Tech Stun
effect: Flipping a table briefly stuns nearby enemies.

name: Heart Holster
effect: Grants a heart container.

name: Heart Lunchbox
effect: Grants a heart container.

name: Heart Locket
effect: Grants a heart container.

name: Heart Bottle
effect: Grants a heart container.

name: Heart Purse
effect: Grants a heart container.

name: Ruby Bracelet
effect: Thrown guns will explode.

name: Sixth Chamber
effect: Increases Coolness by 2 for each point of Curse the player has. Increases Curse by 2.

name: Busted Television
effect: Upon use, the television is thrown in the direction of the cursor. Dropped upon dodge rolling.

name: Coolant Leak
effect: Sprays water forward.

name: Heart of Ice
effect: Grants a heart container. Taking damage releases bouncing ice bullets. Increases coolness by 1.

name: Ancient Hero's Bandana
effect: Quadruples maximum ammo.

name: Bloodied Scarf
effect: Replaces the dodge roll with a teleport. Increases reload speed.

name: Muscle Relaxant
effect: Increases accuracy..

name: Hip Holster
effect: Reloading a weapon fires it once for free.

name: Clone
effect: Upon death, the player is revived in the starting room of the first floor, retaining all items and guns.

name: Sponge
effect: Removes all liquids near the player.

name: Gas Mask
effect: Grants immunity to poison.

name: Hazmat Suit
effect: Grants immunity to fire, poison, and electricity.

name: Book of Chest Anatomy
effect: Improves the contents of broken chests.

name: Gun Soul
effect: Adds a heart container. Upon death, the player respawns at the start of the current floor with one heart container and only starting items and guns. All enemies previously killed will respawn, and if the player reaches the location where they died, they will return to normal and receive all of their items and guns.

name: Shelleton Key
effect: Allows any chest or lock to be opened without using a key. Increases curse while held.

name: Brick of Cash
effect: Reveals secret rooms.

name: Battle Standard
effect: Increases the damage of companions and charmed enemies.

name: Wingman
effect: Orbits the player, firing rockets at enemies.

name: Wolf
effect: Chases and bites enemies.

name: Dog
effect: Follows the player around, occasionally digs up a pickup upon completing a room, and barks at mimic chests.

name: Owl
effect: Follows the player, firing bullets at enemies and occasionally using short-ranged blanks.

name: Super Space Turtle
effect: Follows the player, firing bullets at enemies.

name: Junk
effect: Has no effect on its own. Often spawned by destroying chests.

name: R2G2
effect: Follows the player, firing bullets at enemies.

name: Lies
effect: No effect.

name: Badge
effect: Summons a police officer that follows the player, firing bullets at enemies. Can be talked to. Can die after taking too much damage. Talking to him after he dies increases the player's damage and curse.

name: Ser Junkan
effect: Summons Ser Junkan, who follows the player, attacks enemies, and becomes stronger for each Junk picked up.

name: Chicken Flute
effect: Summons a chicken that follows the player and blocks bullets. After taking a certain amount of damage, it summons an army of chickens to attack enemies.

name: Space Friend
effect: Follows the player, firing lasers at enemies and blocking enemy bullets.

name: Pig
effect: Upon death, instantly revives the player with full health.

name: Blank Companion's Ring
effect: Activates a blank each time an active item is used.

name: Briefcase of Cash
effect: Grants 250  and 3 .

name: Galactic Medal of Valor
effect:
Deal more damage to Bosses.
Increases reload speed and accuracy.

name: Bullet Idol
effect: Deals 45 damage to enemies upon taking damage.

name: Riddle of Lead
effect: Grants a heart container, fully heals the player, increases damage by 25%, increases dodge roll speed by 15%, increases movement speed by 10%, and adds a chance to negate damage.

name: Bracket Key
effect: Deals a large amount of damage to all enemies in a room. Increases Curse.

name: Elder Blank
effect: Activates a blank. Increases curse by 2 while held.

name: Teleporter Prototype
effect: Teleports the player to a random room.

name: Yellow Chamber
effect: Grants 2 heart containers. Upon entering a room, there is a chance that an enemy will be charmed for the duration of the room. Increases fire rate by 15%. Increase curse by 2.

name: Chest Teleporter
effect: Teleports a chest to the next floor, with a chance to upgrade its quality.

name: Loot Bag
effect: Enemies drop more money, but the player drops money upon taking damage. Selling to the Sell Creep grants twice as much money.

name: Drill
effect: If used on a locked chest, forces the player to fight two waves of enemies and unlocks the chest if they survive. If used on a locked door, opens it for free.

name: Clown Mask
effect: Summons a random familiar with a clown mask who either stuns enemies, protects the player with mini blanks, or attacks enemies with a shotgun. An additional familiar is spawned for each additional Payday item the player has.
